title: San Francisco/Golden Gate
name: Bus Stop
directions: between Charlton Ct and Laguna St
price: Happy Hour (M-F 4PM-6PM has $1.50 domestic beers and half price cocktails)
content: The Bus Stop has a comfortable "homey" atmosphere with 17 TVs and sports memorabilia on the walls.  It attracts a twenty-something/thirty-something crowd.
